ai-patthana8.73:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.73:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the supreme guide for those who wish to give rise to three conditions.
ai-patthana8.73:2.1_0: Neither Directly knowing this is a cause and condition for the origination of thought.
ai-patthana8.73:3.1_0: Nor do they give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-patthana8.73:4.1_0: for the sake of cause, based on the five reasons you’re not rid of greed, five, ten, twenty, thirty, or forty.
